title: Water's Edge
description: Nora has a comfortable home and a successful fianc√©, but her seemingly ideal life feels more like a prison than a fairy tale. So when Nora inherits her late uncle's home in a small southeast Alaskan town, she leaves behind everything she's ever known in search of something better. Tucked away from the rest of the world, in a land where one false step can mean the difference between life and death, Nora must learn how to rely on herself for survival... and to open her heart to new possibilities.Water's Edge is the first book in the Alaskan Frontier Romance series.
author: Jennifer McArdle
